ISSUE.TITLE: Consistently apply waiting message to all commands that perform I/O
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Related to #1166 Right now, some commands are displaying a "fetching data" message, and some others are not. We should consistently apply this technique. Example: `now ls` is not doing something like this: ``` ▲ now ls ⠏ Fetching deployments for *zeit* ```
